name: Dr. Maryam Zolnoori
bio: Leading researcher with 15+ years of experience in medical AI and clinical informatics.

name: Ali Zolnour
bio: Ali is a research scientist with a passion for applying deep learning to medical informatics and healthcare AI.

name: Sina Rashidi
bio: Sina is a research scientist with a passion for applying natural language processing to healthcare applications and clinical text analysis.

bio: Yasaman is a machine learning researcher with a passion for applying natural language processing, speech processing and generative AI to healthcare

name: Fatemeh Taherinezhad
bio: Fatemeh is an AI researcher passionate about developing human-centered technologies that leverage language, speech, and generative models to improve healthcare.
